content.description: The amount of money that is given to a new user
The Ids of the shop managers
The higest amount of money you can get for working
The lowest amount of money you can get for working
The amount of time a user needs to wait utill they can use the work command again (in minutes)
The higest amount of money you can get for crime
The lowest amount of money you can get for crime
The amount of time a user needs to wait utill they can use the crime command again (in minutes)
The higest amount of money that a user can rob
The amount that can get robed in precent
The amount of time a user needs to wait utill they can use the rob command again (in minutes)
The ID if the channel for the leaderbord. On this leaderboard everyone can see who has the most money.
Users who can perform admin only actions e.g. manage the balance of users
Allow admins to edit the balance of users (for a fair system not recomended!)
Allow admins to edit their own balance (for a fair system not recomended! DON'T DO THIS!!!!!)
